                                       boolean mate,
                                       Battle battle,
                                       Player player)
Creates a new BattleMonster.

Parameters:
monster - monster card for the monster
monsterLevel - current battle level of the monster
mate - whether or not the monster has a mate
battle - the battle in which information is being collected
player - the player that this information is being collection for
